title: Having problems signing up for PBE
body:
I've been trying to sign up for the PBE, i'm from the BR server but have a NA account, pretty much i go to the site you are suposed to sign up on and this shows up: http://imgur.com/a/DQ4T3
Is this a region problem where i must be from na or eu to sign up or is it a problem with something else? if someone knows how to solve this problem please respond to this post, thank you.

replies.body:
This is a weird issue that rarely happens to some players who try to access this page. You can typically bypass it by using a VPN (Virtual Private Network) such as [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) or [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/).

Let me know if this worked for you!
